name: @thegraid/easeljs-module
description: ESM for EaselJS (for Angluar or Ionic) with @types/createjs.
author: TheGraid <thegraid@gmail.com>

scripts.ignore: the final [14 line] patch for Date()
scripts.diff-patch: diff -c easeljs.js easeljs-patched.js | tail -r | tail -n +14 | tail -r > easeljs.js.patch
scripts.make-patch: cp easeljs.js easeljs-patched.js; gulp compile; npm run diff-patch ; npm run run-patch
scripts.pub: npm run build; npm version ${1:-patch}; npm publish --access public
